buildCommand: npm -r --workspace=@bilancompetence/frontend run build && cp -r apps/frontend/.next .next && cp -r apps/frontend/node_modules/next/node_modules/styled-jsx node_modules/ 2>/dev/null || cp -r apps/frontend/node_modules/styled-jsx node_modules/ 2>/dev/null || true && test -d apps/frontend/public && cp -r apps/frontend/public ./public || true
